hitl.single_operator: Critical controls now rely on a single OPS token plus audit call-sign (ops/ui_api.py:444-495; frontend/src/App.tsx:160-207).
hitl.kill_reason_prompt: frontend/src/App.tsx:126-144 requires operators to enter a reason before invoking the kill switch.
hitl.control_audit_log: ops/ui_api.py:346-520 logs every mutation to ops/logs/control_actions.jsonl via _record_control_action.
hitl.runbook_handoffs: docs/OPS_RUNBOOK.md:20-63 documents pause/resume workflows with optional audit call-signs.

cooldowns.governance_actions: ops/governance_daemon.py:176-212 tracks last_actions per rule and enforces cooldown_seconds before re-triggering.
cooldowns.ui_control_state: frontend/src/App.tsx:179-188 holds controlState to prevent duplicate submissions while awaiting response.

notes.middleware_guard: High-risk control endpoints now use ops.middleware.control_guard.IdempotentGuard (ops/ui_api.py:339-520) with optional actor headers for audit context.
notes.audit_persistence: Governance daemon writes audits to ops/logs/governance_audit.jsonl while retaining the in-memory ring buffer (ops/governance_daemon.py:360-386).
